meanings.definition: The quality or state of being notable.
meanings.sent1: Her notablenesses in the community made her a well-known figure.
meanings.sent2: The notablenesses of the historical figures were highlighted in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The notablenesses of the talking parrot amused the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The notablenesses of the mountain peaks stood out against the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: The notablenesses of the ancient ruins left a lasting impression on the tourists.

meanings.definition: Things or people that are notable.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed various notablenesses from different time periods.
meanings.sent2: She collected notablenesses from around the world to showcase in her gallery.
meanings.sent3: The notablenesses at the event drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent4: The notablenesses in the photograph captured the essence of the moment.
meanings.sent5: His collection of notablenesses included rare artifacts and unique artworks.
